rgb_hsl.palette

Class TriadPalette

  • java.lang.Object
    • rgb_hsl.palette.Palette
      • rgb_hsl.palette.AnalogousPalette
        • rgb_hsl.palette.TriadPalette

  • public class TriadPalette
extends AnalogousPalette
    Palette subclass used to generate a triad color palette. A triad color palette takes the two colors that are equidistant from a base color's hue, where each color is a maximal 120 degrees away from each other in hue.
    Since:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Noah Teshima

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      TriadPalette(Color color)
      Default constructor.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • TriadPalette

        public TriadPalette(Color color)
        Default constructor. Used to set the base color of the triad palette.
        Parameters:
        color - Color reference containing the starting color with which a triadic palette should be generated.
